meanings.definition: Plural of snowman: figures made of snow, typically resembling a person.
meanings.sent1: During winter, children enjoy building snowmen in the yard.
meanings.sent2: The snowmen in the park looked like they were waving at us.
meanings.sent3: The snowmen seemed to be having a snowball fight when we woke up.
meanings.sent4: The snowmen stood tall in the field, frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The snowmen's carrot noses added a touch of whimsy to the snowy landscape.

meanings.definition: Verb: to create figures out of snow, resembling a person.
meanings.sent1: Let's go outside and snowmen together!
meanings.sent2: She loves to snowmen with her friends whenever it snows.
meanings.sent3: We decided to snowmen in the backyard instead of watching TV.
meanings.sent4: The kids planned to snowmen all day long during the snowstorm.
meanings.sent5: The neighbors always snowmen in their front yard, creating a winter wonderland.
